description:
Wish you looked like 2012 Tour de France winner, Bradley Wiggins?

What makes a man attractive? Possibly winning the Tour de France! Research has found women find the fastest cyclists are the most attractive.
Rob and Finn discuss what makes winners the best-looking and explain some words relating to fitness.
This week's question:
How long is the first stage of the Tour de France? Is it:
a) 151 kmb) 191 kmc) 221 km
Listen to the programme to find out the answer.
Are faster cyclists more attractive?
End of Section
